To: Office <office@tibiel.com>
Cc: 'Lyubomir Stoyanov' <lstoyanov@hexonic.com>
Subject: K23/1044 + 4023294 
 

Dear Mr. Ivanov,

 

please, be so kind and find enclosed Sales Agreement № K23/1044 for signing and Pro Forma Invoice № 4023294 of 50% for proceeding of payment. 

 

The proforma of the rest 50% payment will be sent before dispatch of the goods. We will expect you to arrange transport on your own costs, the pick-up address is written in the Sales agreement.  

*         delivery date on 22.12.2023 - delivery date is approximate. Production starts with the payment. Please proceed the payment as soon as possible. 

*         logistic department will send an information after dispatching of goods

 

Thank you for your order and have a nice day.

 

 

 

S pozdravem / Best Regards/ Поздрави

Tereza jordanova
Sales Assistant

Agreement:
1. Seller is obligated to deliver the product according to conditions at this sales agreement.
2. Buyer is obligated to pay to seller price according to this sales agreement.
3. Seller is obligated to give the guarantee quality for 24 months from date of delivery.
4. Buyer undertakes, in the event of withdrawal from the contract, to pay the seller a penalty fine in the amount
of 10 % of the total price.
